description: How did 16 policemen come to be deported from the British Isles to Nazi-occupied Europe?
title: The 'Robin Hood' policemen who stole from the Nazis
title_page: The 'Robin Hood' policemen who stole from the Nazis - BBC News
maintext: He said the men were told by the Guernsey authorities to plead guilty so the Germans would let them also be tried in the local court, where any conviction "would count for nothing after the war".
